text: Allah vanoisa mberi muenzaniso wemuranda (asingatendi) ari pasi peumwe munhu, haana simba rezvese, uye nemurume (mutendi) uyo watakapa raramo yakanaka kubva kwatiri uye anoishandisa muchivande uye nepachena. Vakaenzana here? Kurumbidzwa kwese nekutenda ndekwa Allah. Asi vakawanda vavo havazivi
